comments:
I got SWT error: "No more handles" several times since last few weeks. Not
really often but enough to be noticeable and so open a bug about this issue...

Currently I'm using build I20050906-1200 but also got it with previous build.
I'm using eclipse default VM arg for memory (ie. -Xmx256M and -Xms40M).

I do not think it's really a duplicate of other "No more handle" bugs already
opened as eclipse didn't crash but exited normally. By the way, it's sounds
really similar to bug 96113...

This time I got this error while refactoring but it also happened while
switching between 2 eclipse windows or just while saving file I was editing...

Here's stack trace I get after the exit:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-09-14 15:24:09.338

Something must be leaking.  Can you try and watch the system resources while
using Eclipse to maybe try to narrow it down?  Try shutting off features and see
if any in particular cause the leak?  Given that it only happens every so often
I think this will be difficult to track down.

I (hopefully?) didn't get this problem recently.
Feel free to set this bug as REMIND, I'll reopen when (if) it happens again...
Please reopen this bug report if it happesn again.
